casebody.data:
State
v.
Mason White Hyde 88P15-3 Supreme Court of North Carolina. July 19, 2016 Mason W. Hyde, James R. Grant, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Hyde, Mason White. Kimberly N. Callahan, Assistant Attorney General, Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General, for State of N.C.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 18th of July 2016 by Defendant to Allow Applicant the Opportunity to Correct/Amend Any Defects, Errors, Flaws in the Application:

"Motion Dismissed as moot by order of the Court in conference, this the 19th of July 2016."
